forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Record high temperatures expected. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Record high temperatures expected. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain in the morning, with showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing late. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 51F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
